title: Wild mushroom and rice soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1L chicken stock (or water)', '50g rice', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 bay leaf', '2 potatoes, cut into cubes', '1 carrot, cut into cubes', '200g wild mushrooms', 'chopped fresh parsley, to taste']
